912.question: what metrics are used in evaluation?
912.response: {'Answer': 'The metrics used in evaluation are F1 score and standard deviation.'}

914.question: what previous systems were compared to?
914.response: {'Answer': 'Yang et al (2017), Hashimoto et al (2016), Søgaard and Goldberg (2016), Chiu and Nichols (2016), Collobert et al (2011), Luo et al (2015), Lample et al. (2016), and Ma and Hoey (2016) systems were compared to.'}
914.answer: Chiu and Nichols (2016), Lample et al. (2016), Ma and Hovy (2016), Yang et al. (2017), Hashimoto et al. (2016), Søgaard and Goldberg (2016)
